title: More fuel due next three days, queues to end: Ministry
body_lines: Since more ships carrying fuel are to sail in the next three days, the long queues at filling stations will gradually come to an end, power and energy ministry said.
Both diesel and petrol shipments are due in the country in the next three days, they said.
Accordingly, the country will have sufficient diesel, 92 and 95 octane petrol, and crude oil in the coming days. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
